name: @umbraco-ui/uui-keyboard-shortcut
description: This package contains two web components - uui-key and uui-keyboard-shortcut. They can be used to illustrate key combination for keyboard shortcuts

scripts.build: npm run analyze && tsc --build --force && rollup -c rollup.config.js
scripts.clean: tsc --build --clean && rimraf dist lib/*.js lib/**/*.js custom-elements.json
